Hi,

How can I change the HeaderRow color of a datagrid?  Columns of the datagrid is auto generated by the ItemSource.

Thanks!

Take a look at this post by Jaime Rodriguez here, http://blogs.msdn.com/jaimer/archive/2009/01/20/styling-microsoft-s-wpf-datagrid.aspx.  It goes through a bunch of scenarios for styling the DataGrid.
